description: This file defines a mock class `MotionDetectionImplMock` for unit testing motion detection-related functionalities. It uses Google Mock to create mock methods for the `MotionDetectionImpl` interface, allowing tests to simulate and verify behavior related to motion detection features.

classes.name: MotionDetectionImplMock
classes.description: A mock class for `MotionDetectionImpl` interface, enabling unit testing by mocking motion detection methods.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_Platform_Init
methods.description: Mock method for initializing the motion detection platform.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_Platform_Term
methods.description: Mock method for terminating the motion detection platform.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_RegisterEventCallback
methods.description: Mock method to register a callback for motion events.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_GetMotionDetectors
methods.description: Mock method to retrieve current motion detectors settings.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_ArmMotionDetector
methods.description: Mock method to arm a motion detector with a specified mode and index.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_DisarmMotionDetector
methods.description: Mock method to disarm a specific motion detector.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_IsMotionDetectorArmed
methods.description: Mock method to check if a motion detector is armed.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_SetNoMotionPeriod
methods.description: Mock method to set the no-motion period for a detector.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_GetNoMotionPeriod
methods.description: Mock method to get the no-motion period for a detector.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_SetSensitivity
methods.description: Mock method to set the sensitivity for a detector.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_GetSensitivity
methods.description: Mock method to get the current sensitivity setting.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_SetActivePeriod
methods.description: Mock method to set the active period for motion detection.

methods.name: MOTION_DETECTION_GetActivePeriod
methods.description: Mock method to get the active period settings.
